name: [VR- Cardboard] North Korea - Digital frontier
description:
Play as a North Korean soldier to look after cybernetic sheeps to control them and don't let them pass through the yellow frontier. 

___________________

A group project made with Unity3d

Topic : North Korea and Windows Bliss

Deadline : 3 days

Language : French

THE FILES ARE PROTECTED! Send me a private message for the password

PS : More elements are implemented in the second apk file : northKoreaVR_ver01.7.7z

___________________

Credits:

Game Design : haticehina, skrzynska, Léa Rogliano

Developement : haticehina https://haticehina.itch.io/

Graphic Design : skrzynska https://itch.io/profile/skrzynska

Map : Unity Asset Store

Cette interface VR a été réalisée dans le cadre du projet artistique ‘Carnet de voyage virtuel en Corée du Nord’ dirigé par Léa Rogliano.

(CVVCN)
